item.description: Join us for a pot luck/barbecue/book discussion on Saturday, July 18, from noon until 4 p.m., at the home of Bill and Kathy Lyon in Cornwall. The book discussion will be from 1:30 until 2:30. We will revisit Carl Sagan’s book, “The Varieties of Scientific Experience: A Personal View of the Search for God.” Please choose a quote from the book, no longer than one paragraph, to discuss. There are lots of copies in Connecticut’s public libraries. Directions and more details are available at our web site at www.cthumanist.org and will be in our next newsletter.
item.name: Pot Luck/Barbecue at Bill and Kathy's
